com.paypal.selion.platform.html

Interface WebPage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPage, BasicPageImpl

    public interface WebPage
    A generic interface for web Page Objects in SeLion.

    Note: "web" is used loosely here. This interface can also be implemented to support mobile applications as is the case with BasicPageImpl

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkIfLoaded()
      Checks the page loading status against the pageLoadingValidators defined in the PageYAML for this page.
      String getExpectedPageTitle() 
      WebPage getPage() 
      String getSiteLocale() 
      void initPage(String pagePath, String pageClassName)
      Initialize the page by it's name and page path
      void initPage(String pagePath, String pageClassName, String siteLocale)
      Initialize the page by it's name, page path, and site locale
      boolean isInitialized() 
      boolean isPageLoaded()
      Returns the outcome of calling isPageLoaded() to check if page is considered fully loaded on the Webdriver session.
      boolean isPageValidated()
      Returns the outcome of calling validatePage() to validate the loaded page on the WebDriver session.
      void validatePage()
      Validates the page against the pageValidators defined in the PageYAML for this page.

    • Method Detail

      • initPage

        void initPage(String pagePath,
              String pageClassName)
        Initialize the page by it's name and page path
        Parameters:
        pagePath - the path
        pageClassName - the class name

      • initPage

        void initPage(String pagePath,
              String pageClassName,
              String siteLocale)
        Initialize the page by it's name, page path, and site locale
        Parameters:
        pagePath - the path
        pageClassName - the class name
        siteLocale - the locale to use

      • isInitialized

        boolean isInitialized()
        Returns:
        initialization state

      • getExpectedPageTitle

        String getExpectedPageTitle()
        Returns:
        the expected page title for this page

      • getSiteLocale

        String getSiteLocale()
        Returns:
        the current siteLocale setting for this page

      • getPage

        WebPage getPage()
        Returns:
        a WebPage object

      • validatePage

        void validatePage()
        Validates the page against the pageValidators defined in the PageYAML for this page.
        Throws:
        PageValidationException - when the page does not validate.

      • checkIfLoaded

        void checkIfLoaded()
        Checks the page loading status against the pageLoadingValidators defined in the PageYAML for this page.
        Throws:
        PageValidationException - when the page is still loading.

      • isPageValidated

        boolean isPageValidated()
        Returns the outcome of calling validatePage() to validate the loaded page on the WebDriver session.
        Returns:
        true or false, if the page is validated, meaning all pageValidators pass

      • isPageLoaded

        boolean isPageLoaded()
        Returns the outcome of calling isPageLoaded() to check if page is considered fully loaded on the Webdriver session.
        Returns:
        true or false, if the page is loaded, meaning all pageLoadingValidators pass
